content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and provide detailed instructions.

Analysis of Main Target Image:
- The structure consists of 3 blocks total
- 2 orange cylindrical blocks standing vertically as supports
- 1 green rectangular block laying horizontally on top
- Forms a simple bridge or arch-like structure with 2 layers

Required Blocks from Dictionary:
- 2× orange cylindrical blocks in vertical orientation (Block #7)
- 1× green rectangular block in horizontal orientation (Block #1 or #2)
- Note: Block #1 and #2 appear identical in horizontal orientation, so either can be used

Assembly Steps:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 7
    Step2: Move block with index 7
    Step3: Move block with index 1
}

Assembly Logic:
1. First cylinder forms left support
2. Second cylinder forms right support
3. Green rectangular block placed horizontally across both cylinders

This will create the exact structure shown in the target image, with the correct orientations and spatial relationships between all blocks.
